item.title: UX Development of Developer UX (Prelude)
item.description: I spend a lot of my time-solving problems and some of it translating those solutions into code. If you are reading this, there is a chance that you also do this from time to time. We came a long way in this problem-solving business: today more and more problems are being solved with some form of programming. This was due in large part to the whole sharing nature of developers.
